DOC.detailed_description: Purpose - To identify predictor weight loss overweigh/obese volunteer follow 12 week supervise exercise programme , characterise variability weight loss response . Method - Longitudinal study aim identify predictor weight loss response 12-week exercise programme healthy overweight/obese volunteer . Subjective objective measure appetite , cardiovascular fitness , anthropometry , body composition , rest metabolic rate ( RMR ) , fat carbohydrate oxidation fast state measure baseline , participant enroll study exercise intervention . The preload/test-meal paradigm ( use high low-energy preload : HEP v LEP ) use assess short-term appetite control exercise intervention follow randomize single-blinded crossover design . Moreover , long-term effect exercise cytokine plasma level fast postprandial level appetite relate hormones/metabolites also assess baseline end study . Participants act control throughout study .
